content:
Hi, 
When I merged two dictionaries in PS3, I used an operand " | " and it worked well in my Python environment. However, the operand seems not to be working in the autograder, which might be a reason for the lower grade. Could you check my code in different ways?
Thank you.
subject: PS3 grade  " | " operand

content:
This is a new feature in python 3.9. The tester must be using an older version. I will flag a TA to regrade your pset

Update: Your pset has been regraded and you got 9.6/10. Your code failed one of the test cases for get_most_frequent_words.

Thanks for the update.
Still, the score is 5.4/10. Will it be updated on the website? Or has it stored with 9.6/10 somewhere?
It's been updated as of about an hour ago.
